channel.title: Website on LJ-Left Creations Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Website on LJ-Left Creations Blog

item.title: New Landing Page
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: From now on, the Canva website is my landing page. More tidy, and bold, than my blog. Easily summarise what I do, not only myself, but for you. https://lj-leftcreations.my.canva.site/

item.title: Chatbot
item.author: joeliuprimary@gmail.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Scroll to the bottom and check it out! Use Crisp to do it. Thanks Hugo Addon page. However, just a nice feature, but I probably won’t reply as much as my social media. Featured Image courtesy of Trolli on Giphy: The Lego Movie copyright of The Lego Group and Warner Brothers.
